## Erc721SignatureMinting.verify() method

Verify that a payload is correctly signed

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signedPayload | [SignedPayload](./sdk.signedpayload.md) | the payload to verify |
